software.name: oemdash
software.notes: Menu is navigable, eventually cannot boot Xbox Game Discs Converted to .raw thru qemu-img then back into .chd format. At the time of this writing chdman v5 fumbles with -chs (tries to convert it to 32k cylinders) assume standard Seagate -chs 16383,16,63 was used instead, cfr. https://xboxdevwiki.net/Xbox_Hard_Disk_Technical_Details Expects to be writable straight off the bat -debug has custom video options, particularly the "xbox nv2a_combiners", cfr. "xbox help" for details.
